item.title: It still kind of boggles the mind that as late as mid 90s, nobody really knew how to fight another human.

Jordan Schachtel @ dossier.substack.com on Twitter

“Random thought: It still kind of boggles the mind that as late as mid 90s, nobody really knew how to fight another human. Millions of years of human history & the entire population remained clueless, as exposed to the world by Royce Gracie. The early UFCs are so worth your time.”

31 lessons from 31 years
item.description:
I started writing this as my 31st birthday approached and finally got around to finishing it. Here are 31 lessons I’ve learned so far in my unusual life. 1. Don’t give unsolicited advice. 2. Have friends outside of your profession. 3. Events, both good and bad, are more often enjoyable when they become memories…

URL: https://robkhenderson.substack.com/p/31-lessons-from-31-years?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: For Appeasement in Ukraine, &

item.title: NFTs will (probably) be back
item.description:
NFTs are really the third use that people have found for blockchain technology. The first one was illicit value transfers; Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies may not be a very good form of money in general, but they make it easier to commit cybercrimes and to evade nations’ capital controls. The second one was DAOs, which at least in theory allow people to form organizations without paying the overhead of hiring lawyers (though as far as I can tell this…

URL: https://noahpinion.substack.com/p/nfts-will-probably-be-back?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: For Appeasement in Ukraine, &

Singer-songwriter Don McLean has announced that he’s dropping out from performing at the National Rifle Association’s annual meeting this weekend in Houston, saying it would be “disrespectful and hurtful” to perform days after 19 children and two adults were killed in a mass shooting in the state…

item.title: Adam W Gaffney
item.description:
Adam W Gaffney on Twitter

“An important new study is out. Baseline findings from the NIH’s longitudinal, intramural Long COVID study — perhaps the most detailed, controlled, comprehensive investigation of multiple health metrics in this setting thus far conducted — were just published in @AnnalsIM A🧵 1/”

URL: https://twitter.com/awgaffney/status/1528876982754476032

source: Best of Twitter - Week of May 23, 2022

item.title: Adam W Gaffney
item.description:
Adam W Gaffney on Twitter

“The study enrolled 189 mostly non-hospitalized adults post-Covid & 120 controls. Post-acute sequelae of COVID (PASC) were defined as subgroup w/ worsening symptoms/conditions after COVID-19 All participants went to the NIH for an extensive battery of tests, including: 2/”

URL: https://twitter.com/awgaffney/status/1528876984687808512

source: Best of Twitter - Week of May 23, 2022

item.title: Adam W Gaffney
item.description:
Adam W Gaffney on Twitter

“To summarize, there was a large burden of symptoms & worse mental health post-COVID (particularly among those with PASC) but no difference in objective neurocognition, & no evidence of “ongoing systemic inflammation or immune activation” or any organ damage. Some caveats: 13/”

URL: https://twitter.com/awgaffney/status/1528877012395302912

source: Best of Twitter - Week of May 23, 2022
